snippet.title: Master System Longplay [105] Laser Ghost
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Kage Negra

A no-death run of Laser Ghost for the Sega Master System, to beat the last boss you must shoot all the faces quickly before the Poltergeist comes out and he is invincible. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
